itunes:subtitle: Kash Patel, the former Chief of Staff for the Secretary of Defense under Donald Trump, discusses his role in investigating Russia-gate and debunking Steele Dossier, to what extent the Russians and other foreign actors do interfere in elections, what the ...
itunes:summary:
Kash Patel, the former Chief of Staff for the Secretary of Defense under Donald Trump, discusses his role in investigating Russia-gate and debunking Steele Dossier, to what extent the Russians and other foreign actors do interfere in elections, what the Trump administration did to prepare for the rally on January 6th, and how badly the Biden administration bungled the Afghanistan pullout.
